description:
Odin was a tall, gangly teenager in high school. He was an honors student who didn't have much luck with the girls. So he took up weight lifting and packed on some muscle pretty quickly. Now, a few years later, he's got an amazing physique and he's enjoying the attention it gets him from the opposite sex.

He's in college now studying economics. He's still kind of a bookworm, but loves flexing and showing off his body...
title: Odin
